agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Insurance TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, February 26, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Eddie Lucio III The committee will meet to hear invited testimony from the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
